highlights.title: 19.5 : India:117/1
highlights.description: 19.5: T Shamsi to S Dhawan, Loopy full ball outside off, spinning away, Dhawan once again fails to connect with his horizontal bat shot.

highlights.title: 19.4 : India:117/1
highlights.description: 19.4: T Shamsi to S Dhawan, Full flighted ball outside off, driven off the front foot but straight to mid off.

highlights.title: 19.3 : India:117/1
highlights.description: 19.3: T Shamsi to S Dhawan, Leans forward to a full ball and defends it back to the bowler.

contents.description: P Negi to S Nadeem, OUT! All over! Drifting down the leg side, Nadeem looks to clear Delhi but fails to connect well. The ball falls straight down the throat of Jadhav at deep mid-wicket who takes a good catch. bangalore wib by 10 runs!

contents.title: Twitter: some title here
contents.description:
74% voter turnout till 4pm, it likely to go up as there are people in queues to vote even now: Election Commission #TripuraElection2018 pic.twitter.com/UWktStCOp7

— ANI (@ANI) February 18, 2018

P Negi to S Nadeem, OUT! All over! Drifting down the leg side, Nadeem looks to clear Delhi but fails to connect well. The ball falls straight down the throat of Jadhav at deep mid-wicket who takes a good catch. bangalore wib by 10 runs!

Can Dinesh Karthik be utilised as India's new finisher?
